Setup - compile retroshare-nogui. You need a patched version at the moment. - create a user account on Archlinux - set the path to retroshare-nogui and RETROSHARE_OS_USER in plugins/retroshare/main.py
What works? - create new Retroshare Identity/Location - start/stop locations, view status running/stopped - you can use the rswebui-plugin to control retroshare-nogui: https://gitorious.org/rswebui/rswebui (only one instance can use rswebui, because there is only one port 9090)
